thread.section_title: Quicken Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Quicken Loans | www.quickenloans.com | 4 of 280
thread.title: Diane Busby
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Diane Busby

author: Diane Busby
title: Diane Busby
text: From start to finish, our loan took less than 3 weeks. We were approved for the loan with in minutes and actually had a payment plan within minutes. Every question was answerd in a timely manner and their use of e mail and their web site was just perfect. Everyone I talked to personaly, answered every question we had and if they did not have the answer, there was someone that did. My husband and I were very pleased with the whole process and there were no surprises.
